snippet.title: * Showcase* The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary...
snippet.description:
Yikes this game is DARK. The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary has you play as the shootter during and before the events of the Sandy Hook Elementary shootting.

The game  got under heavy fire by the news and the parents of the victims. 
I truly hope that the families of the victims the best. and i wish that something like the Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary does NOT happen again.


GameJolt: The Slaying Of Sandy Hook Elementary

#gamejolt  

#guncontrol
